Behemoth | He Taketh It With His Eyes |.description: The behemoth has taken flight back to its dominion. Make chase and finish the legendary beast once and for all.
Behemoth | He Taketh It With His Eyes |.name: He Taketh It With His Eyes

Odin | Steel Reign | odin.description: Atop his mighty steed, clad in armor darker than the void, the elder primal Odin has returned to Eorzea to exact his brutal judgment upon the realm.
Odin | Steel Reign | odin.name: Steel Reign

Coeurlregina | Coeurls Chase Boys Chase.description: Her main offensive a tactical failure, Coeurlregina has sounded the retreat. However, if allowed the luxury of escape, it will only be a matter of time before the wicked beast is conspiring another assault. Make chase, and end the queen's reign here and now.
Coeurlregina | Coeurls Chase Boys Chase.name: Coeurls Chase Boys Chase Coeurls
Coeurlregina | Coeurls Chase Boys Chase.timer:
**Stage 1** | 24-48 Hours after Stage 3 (or failure)
**Stage 2** | 2-12 Hours after Stage 1
**Stage 3** | 2-12 Hours after Stage 2

Proto Ultima | Prey Online | ultima | ul.description: After five millennia offline, Proto Ultima has restored auxiliary power and begun a full systems check. To recharge its main power cells, the Allagan killing machine has deployed several aether collectors guarded by some of the most frightening of the fallen empire's godless creations.
Proto Ultima | Prey Online | ultima | ul.name: Prey Online

Tamamo Gozen | Foxy Lady | foxy | tamamo.description: Upon capture by a wicked Hingan onmyoji, the nine-tailed fox spirit slumbering deep within the young maiden Hikuzume awakens. Now, the only way to stop the legendary Tamamo Gozen is with an excessive display of force.
Tamamo Gozen | Foxy Lady | foxy | tamamo.name: Foxy Lady

Ixion | A Horse Outside | ixion | ma the.description: It is said on a mighty levinbolt doth the warsteed Ixion ride-thunder, the rumbling of his hooves as they pound the very heavens. Ware the coming storm, for hell descendeth.
Ixion | A Horse Outside | ixion | ma the.name: A Horse Outside

Archaeotania | The Head, the Tail, the W.description: Drawn by the scent of sanguine coral, Archaeotania finally shows itself. The time has come to end its reign of terror once and for all.
Archaeotania | The Head, the Tail, the W.name: The Head, the Tail, the Whole Damned Thing
Archaeotania | The Head, the Tail, the W.process:
**Stage 1** | [Where Has the Dagon](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Where_Has_the_Dagon)
**Stage 2** | [Ondo of Blood](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Ondo_of_Blood)
**Stage 3** | [Lookin' Back on the Track](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Lookin%27_Back_on_the_Track)
**Stage 4** | [Coral Support](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Coral_Support)
**Stage 5** | [Low Coral Fiber](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Low_Coral_Fiber)
**Stage 6** | [Nothing Like a Trappin' Life](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Nothing_Like_a_Trappin%27_Life)

Formidable | A Finale Most Formidable |.description: It appears that the Goggs have been secretly engineering a massive new automaton capable of thwacking and throttling on a scare heretofore unheard of. Put an end to the malevolent machina by doing a little thwacking and/or throttling of your own.
Formidable | A Finale Most Formidable |.name: A Finale Most Formidable
Formidable | A Finale Most Formidable |.process:
**Stage 1** | [Ironbeard Builders - Resist](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Ironbeard_Builders_-_Resist)
**└►Stage 1b** | [Ironbeard Builders - Revolt](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Ironbeard_Builders_-_Revolt)
**└►Stage 1c** | [Ironbeard Builders - Rebuilt](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Ironbeard_Builders_-_Rebuilt)
**Stage 2a** | [Foes Most Formidable](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Foes_Most_Formidable)
**└►Stage 2b** | [A Family Most Formidable](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/A_Family_Most_Formidable)

Chi | Omicron Recall: Killing Order | ch.description: Unit N-6205 has successfully established a connection with Chi─which has arrived with offensive protocols fully primed. It would seem that the only way to retrieve its data is to defeat it in combat.
Chi | Omicron Recall: Killing Order | ch.name: Omicron Recall: Killing Order

Daivadipa | Devout Pilgrims vs. Daivadip.description: Hearing the prayers of pilgrims, a deity has descended─albeit a false one from the Tower of Zot. This pretender to the name of Daivadipa must be consigned to the aether whence it came.
Daivadipa | Devout Pilgrims vs. Daivadip.name: Devout Pilgrims vs. Daivadipa
Daivadipa | Devout Pilgrims vs. Daivadip.process:
**Stage 1** | [Devout Pilgrims vs. the Jungle Lizards](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Devout_Pilgrims_vs._the_Jungle_Lizards)
**Stage 2** | [Devout Pilgrims vs. the Apalala](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Devout_Pilgrims_vs._the_Apalala)
